Description: The Alchemist throws alchemical bombs and drinks concoctions of his own making during combat
The barbarian flies into a rage on the battlefield, smashing foes with abandon
Performance and secrets of the occult enable the bard to distract foes and inspire allies
The cleric calls on the power of a diety to cast spells that can heal or harm foes
The druid uses the natural world's magic to bolster her and her allies' strength while calling pain down upon enemies
The fighter is a master of weapons, martial techniques, and powerful attack combinations
The monk spins the secret of matial arts into dazzling displays of battlefield prowess
The paladin is a champion of her deity who uses divine power to enhance her heroics and protect her allies
The ranger is a master of using his surroundings, including traps and animal allies, to harry enemies
The rogue is a multitalented master of skuldugery who strikes when enemies least expect it
The sorcerer's magical might flows through her blood and manifests as fantastic spells and abilities
The wizard is an eminent scholar whose reservoirs of arcane knowledge power his wonderous spells and abilities
